00140 #define arg_VERIFY4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opverify
00141 #define res_VERIFY4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opverify
00142 
00143 int nfs4_op_verify(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,   
00144                       compound_data_t   * data,
00145                       struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00146 {
00147   fsal_attrib_list_t     file_attr ;
00148   fsal_attrib_list_t     arg_attr ;
00149   cache_inode_status_t   cache_status ;
00150   unsigned int           i = 0 ;
00151   uint32_t               attrmasklist[FATTR4_MOUNTED_ON_FILEID] ; /* List cannot be longer than FATTR4_MOUNTED_ON_FILEID */
00152   uint32_t               attrmasklen = 0 ;
00153   fattr4                 file_attr4 ;
00154   int                    rc = 0 ;
00155   
00156   char            funcname[] = "nfs4_op_verify" ;
00157   
00158   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_VERIFY ;
00159   res_VERIFY4.status =  NFS4_OK  ;
00160   
00161   /* If there is no FH */
00162   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( &(data->currentFH  ) ) )
00163     {
00164       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00165       return NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00166     }
00167   
00168   /* If the filehandle is invalid */
00169   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( &(data->currentFH ) ) )
00170     {
00171       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00172       return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00173     }
00174   
00175   /* Tests if the Filehandle is expired (for volatile filehandle) */
00176   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00177     {
00178       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00179       return NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ;
00180     }
00181   
00182   /* operation is always permitted on pseudofs */
00183   if( nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo( &(data->currentFH) ) )
00184     {
00185       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00186       return res_VERIFY4.status ;
00187     }
00188  
00189   /* Get only attributes that are allowed to be read */
00190   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Check_Access( &arg_VERIFY4.obj_attributes, FATTR4_ATTR_READ ) )
00191     {
00192       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00193       return res_VERIFY4.status ;
00194     }
00195 
00196   /* Ask only for supported attributes */
00197   if( !nfs4_Fattr_Supported(  &arg_VERIFY4.obj_attributes ) )  
00198     {
00199        res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_ATTRNOTSUPP ;
00200        return res_VERIFY4.status ;
00201     }
00202  
00203   /* Get the cache inode attribute */
00204   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( data->current_entry,
00205                                             &file_attr, 
00206                                             data->ht,
00207                                             data->pclient,
00208                                             data->pcontext,
00209                                             &cache_status )) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00210     {
00211       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ; 
00212       return res_VERIFY4.status ;
00213     }
00214 
00215   if( nfs4_FSALattr_To_Fattr( data->pexport,
00216                   &file_attr, 
00217                               &file_attr4,
00218                               data,
00219                               &(data->currentFH),
00220                               &(arg_VERIFY4.obj_attributes.attrmask) ) != 0 )
00221     {
00222       res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00223       return res_VERIFY4.status ;
00224     }
00225 
00226    if( ( rc = nfs4_Fattr_cmp(  &(arg_VERIFY4.obj_attributes) , &file_attr4 ) ) == TRUE )
00227         res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00228    else
00229      {
00230         if( rc == -1 )
00231                 res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_INVAL ;
00232         else
00233                 res_VERIFY4.status = NFS4ERR_NOT_SAME ; 
00234       }
00235 
00236     return res_VERIFY4.status;
00237 } /* nfs4_op_verify */
00238 
00239 
00250 void nfs4_op_verify_Free( VERIFY4res * resp )
00251 {
00252   /* Nothing to be done */
00253   return ;
00254 } /* nfs4_op_verify_Free */
